sentences.sContent: Alfred was intensely ambitious, obsessed with the idea of becoming rich.
sentences.sCn: 艾尔弗雷德雄心勃勃，一心想着发财。

sentences.sContent: ...the United Arab Emirates has endorsed an ambitious target to draw 24% of its primary energy consumption from renewable sources by 2021...
...a newly-developed off-price concept which might help it better compete with ambitious T...
...The Swedes can certainly take a lesson from the United States and look for ways to clear a path for their ambitious female careerists...

exam.question: My sister is quite ______ and plans to get an M.A. degree within one year.

answer.explain: 句意： 我姐姐很有雄心壮志， 她计划在一年之内拿到硕士学位。 aggressive： 好斗的(指对待别人的态度)； enthusiastic： 热心的， 热情的； considerate： 考虑周到的。

synos.tran: 野心勃勃的；有雄心的；热望的；炫耀的

words.tran: 雄心勃勃地；劲头十足地；热切地

trans.tranOther: determined to be successful, rich, powerful etc
